params:
  code_postal: NULL
  ville: NULL
  data: NULL
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Afficher un tableau des informations
params$data %>%
  kable()
```

```{r}
leaflet(params$data) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addCircleMarkers(
    lng = ~lon,
    lat = ~lat,
    popup = ~paste("Code Postal:", `Code_postal_(BAN)`, "<br>",
                   "Etiquette DPE:", Etiquette_DPE),
    radius = 6,
    color = "blue",
    fillOpacity = 0.7
  )

```
